geo-zones.description: Expose polygon overlays, zone analytics, and provider coverage insights across staging maps.

booking-orchestrator.description: Enable multi-serviceman assignments, SLA timers, and dispute hooks for integration testing.

rental-marketplace.description: Gate staged rental listings, deposit handling, and inventory ledger reconciliation flows.

communications-suite.description: Allow AI assisted chat and Agora video inside controlled pilot cohorts for QA rehearsals.

analytics-dashboards.description: Serve telemetry console, diagnostics, and persona dashboards with governed export flows.
